title: Doom bots reward?
body: Is there meant to be a reward for winning doom bots(like an icon or something) i saw a post about it before but have no recieved one myself and have won it several times now? o.o

replies.body:
There are two free icons available with the event, one for [sacrificing 500 minions in the mini game](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016) and the other for winning a game of doom bots before the 4th of November.

After becoming eligible for these kinda rewards, you may have to wait anywhere up to two weeks for them to be distributed to your account. ~~Another thing worth noting is that (while I don't believe it to be the case for this event) sometimes the eligibility for the icons is determined upon the events end, with another up to two weeks for distribution.~~

 EDIT: 
> *Icons will be granted up to two weeks after 04/11/16 at 17:59 AEDT.

In other words, don't worry, you'll get your icon eventually.

Because we didn't know the ins and outs of the systems as well as we could have, so we were encouraged to include direct sources where possible to strengthen our own knowledge and to confirm it for people who didn't know who we were.

I try to maintain a certain level of professionalism as an emissary because it reflects on the volunteers as a whole and with the fancy names we are under a lot more scrutiny (as you have proven). That doesn't mean that being an emissary has changed my moral code, that would be rather absurd.

This is loosely connected to doom bot 'rewards' but I feel like we should receive more IP overall. We're getting absolutely pummeled out there agains them and they still only reward us the normal amount for normal Co-Op bots

They are still much shorter games though. You get less IP for ARAMs than for norms because they are shorter games, and the same applies here. While more IP would always be nice, I can see why we get less for RGM/ARAMs etc.

I agree, there should be a better IP reward to other game modes. Basing IP on time spent in game is pretty lazy.

Spend 17 minutes fighting doom bots for 30ish IP. Does that sound reasonable? Only 10 more games an i might be able to unlock a 450 IP Champ!

The incentive/novelty wears pretty thin after you get the icon. If you want to run this mode for 2 weekends in a row, there is going to need to be greater incentive, otherwise the will be a large drop in players.

At least give us an IP boost for this mode.
